trans-unit.source: Provides the data for the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 提供的数据<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] A tracking service that implements the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification> interface raises a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated> event to notify the runtime tracking infrastructure that the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> for a particular workflow <xref:System.Type> has changed.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]实现跟踪服务<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification>接口引发<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated>事件以通知运行时跟踪基础结构，<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>特定工作流<xref:System.Type>已更改。</xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification>

trans-unit.source: The tracking service uses a ProfileUpdatedEventArgs to provide the workflow <xref:System.Type> and the new <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> to the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 跟踪服务使用 ProfileUpdatedEventArgs 提供的工作流<xref:System.Type>和新<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>到运行时跟踪基础结构。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> </xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService> uses a ProfileUpdatedEventArgs when it raises the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService.ProfileUpdated?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>时，它会发出使用 ProfileUpdatedEventArgs<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService.ProfileUpdated?displayProperty=fullName>事件。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService.ProfileUpdated?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>

trans-unit.source: When it receives a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated> event, the runtime tracking infrastructure will update the tracking profile for the specified workflow <xref:System.Type> in its profile cache.
trans-unit.target: 当它收到<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated>事件，运行时跟踪基础结构将更新指定工作流的跟踪配置文件<xref:System.Type>其配置文件缓存中。</xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: If you use this constructor when you raise a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated> event inside a tracking service, you must explicitly set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs.TrackingProfile%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用此构造函数引发的<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated>事件在跟踪服务，你必须显式设置<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A>和<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs.TrackingProfile%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs.TrackingProfile%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs"></xref> class that specifies a new <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref> for the specified workflow <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs"></xref>指定一个新的类<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref>指定工作流<xref:System.Type>.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: A new instance of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs> is created with <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A> set to the specified <xref:System.Type> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs.TrackingProfile%2A> set to the specified profile.
trans-unit.target: 新实例<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs>使用创建<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A>设置为指定<xref:System.Type>和<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs.TrackingProfile%2A>设置为指定的配置文件。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs.TrackingProfile%2A> </xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of workflow for which the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref> has changed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>为其的流<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref>已更改。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The new <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The new <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the new <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref> for the workflow Type.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置新<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref>为工作流类型。

trans-unit.source: When the runtime tracking infrastructure receives a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated> event it will update its profile cache with the new <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> for the workflow <xref:System.Type> specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 当运行时跟踪基础结构收到<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated>它将新<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>工作流<xref:System.Type>指定<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A>。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A></xref:System.Type></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>其配置文件缓存中更新的事件</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref> for the workflow type.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"> </xref>的工作流类型。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.Type> of the workflow whose <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref> should be updated.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref:System.Type>工作流其<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref>应更新。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A> specifies the workflow <xref:System.Type> for which the tracking profile has changed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A>指定的工作流<xref:System.Type>有关跟踪配置文件已更改。</xref:System.Type></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs.TrackingProfile%2A> is set to the new tracking profile.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs.TrackingProfile%2A>设置为新跟踪配置文件。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs.TrackingProfile%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the runtime tracking infrastructure receives a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated> event it will update its profile cache with the new <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> for the workflow <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: 当运行时跟踪基础结构收到<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated>它将新<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>工作流<xref:System.Type>.</xref:System.Type></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>其配置文件缓存中更新的事件</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of a workflow.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>的工作流。</xref:System.Type>
